title: Scenario: Launch of Team Stats page
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled to the top
custom_expected:
Then
The text at the top of the page should read <year> <team> <typeOfStat> Stats
where year is dependent on the year that it is and if it is the offseason or not (offseason  will point to the last playing year)
and 
team is the name_short
and
typeOfStat is either batting or pitching - on the first launch of the page it should say Batting

title: Scenario: Clicking on batting button
custom_steps:
When
The batting button is clicked
custom_expected:
Then
The url is changed to http://wap.milb.com/<file_code>/stats/?type=1
and
the page should be titled <year> <name_short> Batting Stats
and
the default stat should be Home Runs
and
all entries under the team column should be all be of the the team matching the <file_code>

title: Scenario: Clicking on the pitching button
custom_steps:
When
The Pitching button is clicked on
custom_expected:
Then
The url is http://wapb.milb.com/<file_code>/stats/?type=2 such that <file_code> here matches the <file_code> from given
and
the default stat is ERA
and
the page is titled <year> <team> Pitching stats
 where year corresponds to the playing year, if offseason then it is the most recent playing year 
 and team corresponds to name_short
and all the entries under team are of the team whose stats page it is.

title: Scenario: Batting stats options
custom_steps:
When
Click on the drop down box that says Home Runs
custom_expected:
Then
The options in the drop down should be (Home Runs, RBI, Average, On-base Percentage, Slugging Percentage, Stolen Bases, Hits, Runs).

title: Scenario: Pitching stats options
custom_steps:
When
The drop down box that says ERA is clicked.
custom_expected:
Then
The options in the drop down box are (ERA, Wins, Strikeouts, Saves, WHIP, Winning %, Games, Innings Pitched).

title: Scenario: Home Runs
custom_steps:
When
Batting is clicked on 
and
Home Runs is selected from the drop down
custom_expected:
Then
The results returned should be in descending order in respect to the HR column.
and
the URL is http://wapb.milb.com/<file_code>/stats/?stat=HR&type=1 such that <file_code> corresponds to the <file_code> from given.
